      • openProject

        public Project openProject(Access access)
                    throws StorjException
        Returns a Project handle for the given Access.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        a Project handle
        Throws:

      • requestAccessWithPassphrase

        public Access requestAccessWithPassphrase(java.lang.String satelliteAddress,
                                          java.lang.String apiKey,
                                          java.lang.String passphrase)
                                   throws StorjException
        Generates a new access grant using a passhprase. It must talk to the Satellite provided to get a project-based salt for deterministic key derivation.

        Note: this is a CPU-heavy function that uses a password-based key derivation function (Argon2). This should be a setup-only step. Most common interactions with the library should be using a serialized access grant through ParseAccess directly.

        Parameters:
        satelliteAddress - the satellite address
        apiKey - the api key
        passphrase - the passphrase
        Returns:
        the access grant
        Throws:
        StorjException - in case of error
